subject: Order #SSN4024 – Item Not Received
description_text:
Hello,

I am contacting you regarding *order #SSN4024*.

I have *not received the **Simsonn HS Pro Shifter – H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing
Simulation Shifter*, even though it is listed as *released on December 7*.
Additionally, *I have not received any shipping confirmation or tracking
link* so far.

Could you please:

   -

   confirm whether the order has been shipped,
   -

   provide the tracking link,
   -

   or let me know the next steps for a refund if the item has not yet been
   sent.

Thank you in advance for your help.
I look forward to your reply.

Kind regards,

conversations.body_text: Hi Randy Alphonso,  The HS Pro is expected to be shipped between December 20 and 22.
